messages.subject: Re: name change WAS Unschooling for everyone, labels not needed
messages.msgSnippet: ... ~~Is this why I was so confused at NEU? :-)~~ Um yeah...probably.;)  I m having a hard time switching over so he gets kinda irritated with me. We talked
messages.messageBody:
> I'm trying to adapt to the new name without confusing anyone. No, I
> haven't adopted a kid or had another baby....but I do have a Scott now.

~~Is this why I was so confused at NEU? :-)~~

Um yeah...probably.;) I'm having a hard time switching over so he
gets kinda irritated with me. We talked about it last night and I
explained that it was hard because I really LOVE the name Jalen. He
said "yeah, you must love it a LOT" then "who picked my name?" which
entailed a discussion about dh and I choosing together.

He explained how much he loves the name Scott. It was sweet.

Ren

Is this why I was so confused at NEU? :-)


> I'm trying to adapt to the new name without confusing anyone. No, I

messages.subject: Re: name change WAS Unschooling for everyone, labels not needed
messages.msgSnippet: ~~And Ren I just love to read stories of Scott!~~ He does say the dangdest things at times!:) I guess it s easier to say my sweet Scottie boy than my sweet
messages.messageBody:
~~And Ren I just love to read stories of Scott!~~

He does say the dangdest things at times!:) I guess it's easier to say
"my sweet Scottie boy" than "my sweet Jalen boy". lol

I'm trying to adapt to the new name without confusing anyone. No, I
haven't adopted a kid or had another baby....but I do have a Scott now.

Ren

messages.subject: [AlwaysLearning] name change WAS Unschooling for everyone, labels not needed
messages.msgSnippet: He is SO perfectly Jalen (though he changed his name to Scott recently and I m still trying to adapt to that one!). -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- On a lighter note my
messages.messageBody:
He is SO perfectly Jalen (though he changed his name to Scott recently
and I'm still trying to adapt to that one!).
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
On a lighter note my son MD (Marvin Daniel) has informed me his name is now
Flamerider64 or Flamerider for short. So no to call him MD, Mario or Buzz (another nickname).
He is also introducing himself as Flamerider64.
You should see the faces of other parents. Priceless!
And Ren I just love to read stories of Scott!


 
Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow.blogspot.com/
 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/
